abstract: Math professor Tim Chartier and his students at Davidson College are hoping to leverage their expertise in order to win $1 billion prize offered by Quicken Loans and Warren Buffett for anyone who predicts the outcome of each of the 67 games in the NCAA men's basketball tournament.
